mapper.select: SELECT `task_answer`.*, `users`.name as user_name, `users`.head as user_head, `users`.school as user_school FROM `task_answer` LEFT JOIN `users` ON `task_answer`.answerer = `users`.id WHERE `task_answer`.task_id = #{taskId} ORDER BY `task_answer`.nice DESC, `task_answer`.create_time DESC

SELECT `task_answer`.*, `users`.id as user_id, `users`.name as user_name, `users`.head as user_head, `users`.status as user_status, `users`.school as user_school FROM `task_answer` LEFT JOIN `users` ON `task_answer`.answerer = `users`.id WHERE `task_answer`.task_id = #{taskId}
